meanings.definition: The branch of medical science dealing with the classification of diseases.
meanings.sent1: In nosology, doctors study how to group different illnesses.
meanings.sent2: The hospital uses nosology to organize diseases for better treatment.
meanings.sent3: The nosology textbooks made learning about diseases surprisingly fun.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a nosology chart, neatly categorizing every ailment she encountered.
meanings.sent5: The colorful diagrams in the nosology book helped students remember disease classifications easily.

meanings.sent1: The nosology of infectious diseases is crucial for public health.
meanings.sent2: Doctors rely on accurate nosology to diagnose and treat patients effectively.
meanings.sent3: The nosology conference turned into a lively debate on disease categorization.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts swirled like a complex nosology system, trying to make sense of the illnesses around her.
meanings.sent5: The vivid illustrations in the nosology manual brought clarity to the world of disease classification.
